dt.t: a {wi}glitch{/wi} in a spacecraft's fuel cell

dt: {bc}a minor problem that causes a temporary setback {bc}{sx|snag||}

et: perhaps from Yiddish {it}glitsh{/it} slippery place, from {it}glitshn{/it} ({it}zikh{/it}) to slide, glide; akin to Old High German {it}glītan{/it} to glide {ma}{mat|glide|}{/ma}
shortdef: a usually minor malfunction; also : bug
a minor problem that causes a temporary setback : snag
a false or spurious electronic signal
